title: It’s Finally the Event!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Fi-nal-ly! It’s the day of the DiverDiva event!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Ai, can you go to bed now? The day has changed. It’s pointless if you don’t sleep within cinderella time.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Eeeh~, but Ai is so excited that Ai can’t sleep! We’re going to meet all of our fans who come to see DiverDiva, you know!? How can you still sleep, Karin!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>....Well, I get why your mood is so high. Usually, I’m also already in bed by this time, so....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Then let’s just chat like this until the morning~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>We shouldn’t do that. It’ll affect our performance. You don’t want that either, right, Ai?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Well yeah. Ai needs to sleep.... Aaaah, but Ai can’t sleep~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu. Geez, you’re so intense, you know that? Then, wanna try yelling some of that energy out?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yeah! After that, let’s properly go to sleep! ....Ah, but we’ll have to keep our voices down, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>That’s right, good girl. Well then, let’s do our best and have everyone be immersed in today’s event!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yeaaaah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
